subject: SalonElite 7000 motor noise issue
body:
Hi HairTech team,

I run a small hair salon called 'Mike's Cuts' and purchased the SalonElite 7000 on December 5, 2025. We use it for about 6 hours a day on clients.

For the past week, the motor has been making a grinding noise and the heat output seems reduced. It's affecting our ability to serve clients efficiently.

Serial number: SE7K-2025-91234
Order confirmation from your website attached.

Business info:
Mike's Cuts
456 Main Street
San Francisco, CA 94102
Business License: SF-2024-88901

Please help ASAP!

Mike Chen
415-555-0198

metadata.reason: Professional use within limits, motor defect is covered, has business license
